name: activity_delete-thread-subscription
description: Mutes all future notifications for a conversation until you comment on the thread or get an **@mention**. If you are watching the repository of the thread, you will still receive notifications. To ignore future notifications for a repository you are watching, use the [Set a thread subscription](https://docs.github.com/enterprise-server@3.8/rest/reference/activity#set-a-thread-subscription) endpoint and set `ignore` to `true`.

thread_id.description: The unique identifier of the notification thread. This corresponds to the value returned in the `id` field when you retrieve notifications (for example with the [`GET /notifications` operation](https://docs.github.com/enterprise-server@3.8/rest/reference/activity#list-notifications-for-the-authenticated-user)).
